articles.description: NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA) joined forces Tuesday in the battle against climate change, a move they said paves the way to a global response to the problem.

articles.title: England's FA facing disciplinary action over crowd violence at Wembley during Euro 2020 final against Italy - ABC News
articles.description: European football's governing body charges England's Football Association after fans ran riot before, during and after the Euro 2020 final at Wembley.
articles.content:
European football's governing body has opened disciplinary proceedings and charged England's Football Association (FA) over disturbances during the Euro 2020 final against Italy at Wembley.
